content: these easy worsted slipper socks are part of the 2024 holiday maker s challenge from love life yarn they are knit with one skein of worsted weight yarn sample made with knit picks heatherly and the pattern is written for the magic loop method of course you can knit them in any method you like that is worked in the round until december 25 2024 you can download this pattern absolutely free from the site when you join the challenge more info is in the pattern post
